content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:moz="http://www.mozilla.org/2006/browser/search/">   <ShortName>SLiCE Site Search</ShortName>   <Description>The search engine included in mojoPortal Content Managment System</Description>   <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>   <Image type="image/x-icon" width="16" height="16">http://www.slice.colostate.edu/Data/Sites/7/skins/lory-student-center/favicon.ico</Image>   <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="http://www.slice.colostate.edu/SearchEngineInfo.ashx" />   <Url type="application/atom+xml" template="http://www.slice.colostate.edu/SearchResults.ashx?q={searchTerms}&p={startPage?}" />   <Url type="text/html" template="http://www.slice.colostate.edu/SearchResults.aspx?q={searchTerms}&p={startPage?}" />   <moz:SearchForm>http://www.slice.colostate.edu/SearchResults.aspx</moz:SearchForm> </OpenSearchDescription>
